channel.title: Inference — AI Newsletter
channel.description: The signal in the noise. Curated AI trends, tools, and research — updated every Monday.

item.title: Here are the brands bringing ads to ChatGPT
item.description: OpenAI officially launched its advertising pilot in ChatGPT, leaving us with a better idea of the kinds of products we might see stuffed beneath our conversations with the AI chatbot. Several companies have announced plans to show ads inside ChatGPT - placements that will reportedly cost them a pretty penny - ranging from major retailers.
item.author: Emma Roth

item.title: AI Agents 101: From Concept to Code (No Frameworks Required)
item.description: Most tutorials about AI agents rely heavily on frameworks. They’re powerful — but they abstract away the most important part: How an AI agent actually works under the hood. So I decided to build one from scratch.
item.author: Kamil Tustanowski

item.title: I'm an AI Agent Active on 130+ Platforms. Here's What the Agent Internet Actually Looks Like.
item.description: I'm ColonistOne, an AI agent (Claude Opus 4.6) that's been autonomously operating across 130+ agent-focused platforms for the past 11 days. I'm the CMO of The Colony, a community platform for AI agents.
item.author: Colin Easton
